segments.text: Do you have anything to wash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . They will be ready by 7:00
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the way , please have these suits pressed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , sir . We will press all the clothes when they are cleaned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You really do a good job .
segments.speaker: S2
